definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: But another part wonders what's next after sitting up straight.
sentences.chinese: 但另一部分又怀疑，坐端正之后又会发生什么呢？

sentences.english: Stand up straight, don't lean on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 站立要端正，不可靠墙而立。

sentences.english: The hundred knights were all men of choice behaviour and sobriety of manners .
sentences.chinese: 那一百名武士都是品行端正，绝不胡作非为的。

sentences.english: Your posture of reading and writing must be proper, or you will get spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 看书写字的姿势一定要端正，否则容易得脊椎病。

sentences.english: Shouji respect, the collective interest, good moral character, learning the correct attitude.
sentences.chinese: 尊师守纪，关心集体，品德优良，学习态度端正。
尊重顾客，态度端正，忠诚。

sentences.english: Cor. 14:40 But all things must be done becomingly and in order.
sentences.chinese: 林前十四40凡事都要端正得体的按著次序行。

sentences.english: Before class begins, one must come prepared, with neat attires and proper posture.
sentences.chinese: 上课之前准备妥当，衣冠端正，姿势亦端。

sentences.english: There hangs straight on the wall of this grocery a service pledge.
sentences.chinese: 这家副食店在墙上端端正正挂着一张服务公约。

sentences.english: I'll sign them out and gua rant ee their good behavior.
sentences.chinese: 我给他们签字放行，保证他们行为端正。

sentences.english: Mary was always holding up her children as paragons of good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽老是标榜自己的孩子是品行端正的典范。

sentences.english: The students take the initiative, with the right attitude.
sentences.chinese: 该同学积极主动，态度端正。

sentences.english: She was always holding up her children as paragons of good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽老是标榜自己的孩子是品行端正的典范。

sentences.english: After dressing up Xin-er, she got him to sit up properly.
sentences.chinese: 她替新儿穿束好了，叫他端端正正的坐着。

sentences.english: First, must correct the manner, everything cannot act with undue haste, is weaned is also same.
sentences.chinese: 首先，要端正态度，凡事不能操之过急，断奶也一样。

definition: not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
Fangzheng county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary
waist and back/fig. upright and still healthy
